SELECT id AS acId, name, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, (CASE WHEN (start_date < SYSDATE()) AND (end_date > SYSDATE()) THEN 2 WHEN start_date > SYSDATE() THEN 1 WHEN end_date < SYSDATE() THEN 3 ELSE 0 END) AS status, amount, sort, is_on_sale AS isOnSale FROM train_activity_course WHERE 1 = 1
AND name like '%'||#{name}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND start_date > SYSDATE()
AND start_date < SYSDATE() AND end_date > SYSDATE()
AND end_date < SYSDATE()
AND start_date > #{beginDate} OR ( start_date < #{beginDate} AND end_date > #{beginDate} )
AND end_date < #{lastDate} OR ( start_date < #{lastDate} AND end_date > #{beginDate} )
ORDER BY sort DESC

SELECT a.id AS acId, a.name, a.start_date AS startDate, a.end_date AS endDate, a.amount, a.sort, a.head_img AS headImg, b.id AS 'trainActivityCourseContentList.cId', b.type AS 'trainActivityCourseContentList.type', b.img AS 'trainActivityCourseContentList.img' FROM train_activity_course a LEFT JOIN train_activity_course_content b ON a.id = b.ac_id WHERE a.id = #{acId} ORDER BY b.sort
